breedingPlanner.title: Breeding Planner
breedingPlanner.noResultsMessage: No suitable breeding pairs found for this trainee. Try adding more parents to your roster.
breedingPlanner.allSkillsCovered: This pair covers all {{count}} of your wishlist items!
breedingPlanner.allSkillsSaturated: All wishlisted skills are present in every defined ancestor.
breedingPlanner.spBudgetTooltip: The total amount of Skill Points you expect to have available to purchase skills during the training run. This directly impacts how many white sparks can be acquired.
breedingPlanner.probToSurpassFinalLabel: Prob. to surpass {{name}}'s Final Score ({{score}} pts)
breedingPlanner.probToSurpassIndividualLabel: Prob. to surpass {{name}}'s Individual Score ({{score}} pts)
breedingPlanner.disclaimerText: Probabilities are estimates based on game data and certain assumptions:
breedingPlanner.disclaimerScoreUpgrade: Score upgrade probability compares the child's potential individual score to the weaker parent's individual score.
breedingPlanner.disclaimerBlue: Blue spark probability is based on the target stats for all 5 blue factor types.
breedingPlanner.disclaimerPinkDynamic: Pink spark probability is based on the intersection of your Goal and the 'Obtainable Aptitudes' list.
breedingPlanner.disclaimerWhiteSP: The number of white sparks acquired is estimated based on your wishlist, the pair's lineage, and the provided Skill Point Budget. Only Lv. 1 skills are considered.

purchaseOrder.title: Assumed Skill Purchase Order
purchaseOrder.tooltip: View the order in which skills are prioritized for purchase by the probability model.
purchaseOrder.explanation:
The probability model assumes a greedy purchase strategy. It will always attempt to buy available skills in the following order until the SP Budget is depleted:
1. Wishlist Tier (S > A > B > C)
2. Skill Level (Lv. 1 > Lv. 2)
3. SP Cost (Lowest > Highest)
